detail_desc: Biker jacket in imitation suede with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Boxy, oversized jacket in a wool blend with a collar, buttons down the front and large chest pockets with a flap and button. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.

Shirt in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in a premium cotton dobby weave with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a premium cotton dobby weave with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in patterned premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and short slits in the sides.

Short-sleeved shirt in a softly draping, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short-sleeved shirt in a softly draping, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in textured-knit premium cotton. Round neck with a ribbed trim and a contrasting colour trim at the cuffs and hem.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Visible jacquard-weave elastication with a text motif at the bottom.

Boiler suit in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a button, and patch back pockets. Seam at the waist with wide elastication at the back and wide belt loops, a zip fly and buttons and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gently tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Unlined.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and bottoms in glossy satin. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
